'''Ignited Adventurer (I)''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Natlan: The Land of Fire and Competition (I)]]''. The achievements are earned by completing Open World [[Time Trial Challenge]]s in [[Basin of Unnumbered Flames]], [[Tequemecan Valley]], [[Coatepec Mountain]] and [[Toyac Springs]].
